product_name: Theo Chocolate Eastern Congo Initiative Chocolate Bar
long_description: The Theo Chocolate Eastern Congo Initiative Chocolate bar combines 65% cacao chocolate with the warming spice of pili pili chili or the enticing flavor of vanilla nibs. Cocoa, vanilla and spicy peppers in this chocolate bar are grown in eastern Congo by organic farmers. Proceeds from the sale of this chocolate bar will be donated to the Eastern Congo Initiative to help Congolese farmers in eastern Congo. Theo Chocolate Eastern Congo Initiative Chocolate bar is Fair Trade Certified(TM) and USDA organic. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Theo Chocolate Eastern Congo Initiative Chocolate bar combines 65% cacao chocolate with the warming spice of pili pili chili or the enticing flavor of vanilla nibs.
